product_name: WD-40 BIKE Multi-Use Bike Lube - 4 fl. oz.
long_description: A must for every bike tool chest, the WD-40 BIKE Multi-Use Bike Lube in a 4 fl. oz. bottle helps keep your bike in top condition by lubricating, cleansing and protecting vulnerable bike components. Lubricates squeaky shifters, cables, derailleurs and pivot points to keep moving parts smoothly operating. Sheds mud from pedals and cleats, and removes adhesive residue and sticky substances. WD-40 BIKE Multi-Use Bike Lube also prevents rust on steel frames and parts, and frees metal-to-metal seat posts, bottom brackets and bolts during routine maintenance.
short_description: A must for every bike tool chest, the WD-40 BIKE Multi-Use Bike Lube in a 4 fl. oz. bottle helps keep your bike in top condition by lubricating, cleansing and protecting vulnerable bike components.
